alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 5:12AM MST until December 30 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Blowing Snow. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility as low as one-half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front, and Eastern Glacier. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, or lead to lane blockages. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front
